title: "Test Scores 95 percentile"
---

Use the [data from tinyurl.com/M221-dist-shapes](https://tinyurl.com/M221-dist-shapes) to calculate the 95th percentile of test scores.

<details>

<summary>Possible Solution</summary>

``` excel
=PERCENTILE(A:A,0.95)
```

The 95th percentile of test scores is 97.
